column1: #text=Some people ride the train every day as part of their work commute , while others only have the opportunity to ride for vacation or pleasure .
#text=I spend quite a good amount of time researching routes and fares before I decide on the best options for me .
#text=One of the benefits of riding the train is a feeling of a connection to the past .
#text=I feel like I 'm partaking in a part of our shared history , something people have been doing for hundreds of years .
#text=I enjoy sitting by the window and watching the scenery race past .
#text=Making small talk with other passengers is also something I look forward to .
#text=An employee comes by to ensure that everyone has paid their fare .
#text=The soothing rocking motion of the train usually puts me to sleep and before I know it I wake up and it is time to disembark from the train .
